modName: Assassins Creed - Jester Clothes female replacer standalone
summary: Simply a standalone version of the mod "Assassins Creed - Jester Clothes female re-placer" by luix_luix
descriptionHtml:
A standalone version of the mod "[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2868/?]Assassins Creed - Jester Clothes female replacer[/url]" by luix_luix with an added no dark brotherhood hand version.






[b]=installation=

[/b]place the "data" folder into your "data" skyrim directory, or just load the zip into nmm, mod organizer, etc




[b]=How to get the clothes=

[/b]open the console with ~ and type in,[b] help "covert"[/b] this will bring up all the clothing pieces in the mod, type in[b] player.additem [itemid] [number of items]

[/b]this is the only way you can get them, there is no craftable version.




[b]=Credits and Permissions=[/b]

All credit goes to Luix_Luix for awesome mod, please check out their original mod linked above.
author: marchofflowers

files.name: Assassins Creed - Jester Clothes female standalone
